Articles.Content:
Every summer, the KSC lauches a rocket to get minmus kream (minmus ice cream) so they can sell it to
"normal" kerbals and enjoy a summer snack , but this year the KSA revealed that minmus is going to melt and reveal a boring layer of unedible glass by 2023, so everyone wants minmuskream right away , although it's not summer, beause they are afraid there won't be enough of it for the summer. Your mission, bring as much of it to kerbin in a single mission.

Normal mode: go to minmus and mine 40 tons of ore and bring them to Kerbin

Hard mode: same, but bring 80 tons

Bonus mode: hard mode, but only use radial holding tanks

Legend mode: Surprise me

 

Rules:

  1. You must do it in 1 mission
  2. You can only use 1 craft for the mission
  3. You can't use part clipping, nor kraken drives 
  4. No cheat menu!
  5. You craft must survive reentry
  6. You can't use the mined ore for fuel!

Seems interesting, I might try this on-

Quote

You can't use part clipping

ouch

 

I'll still try it but I'll probably use a multistage lander since ISRU and refuel stations aren't allowed

Edited June 14, 2022 by hexeract
